content: free video guides can be found on sirdar website popular crochet designer lindsey of @lottieandalbert is known for her modern crochet as well as her lifestyle and interiors content her design for our blossom & buds blanket is inspired by a garden plan including flowerbeds of tulips blossom falling on a fresh green lawn and daisies large and small your finished blossom & buds crochet blanket would make a beautiful crochet bed-cover a pretty make-over for your sofa or favourite garden chair or as the setting for picture-perfect picnics finished blanket approx dimensions - 128 x 128cm / 50 x 50in you will also need a 4mm crochet hook hayfield bonus dk shades used 3 x cream 812 2 x frost blue 608 2 x lemon 659 2 x oyster pink 614 2 x golden 595 2 x gentle jade 604 1 x grass 825 1 x primrose 957
